page.title: 06FARM MACHINERY
page.content: The more expensive machinery is used by contractors who usually do the combine harvesting and silaging with a precision chop forage harvester and some by big round balers, mowing with a disc mower with conditioner, baling with a baler with a sledge which stacks them in flat eights. Precision drills set the seed at the right distance, direct drills sow the seed straight into the ground without working it. They contract out potato planters and harvesters. Hedges are cut with a flail hedge trimmer.
